description: Performing the role of Team Lead in a digital product team, responsible for coordination, functional definition, and delivery of solutions based on services, integrations, and digital channels.
Main responsibilities:
1) Define and maintain the product vision, translating strategic planning into clear features and tasks for the development team.
2) Manage and evolve the product backlog, leading prioritization to align work with project objectives.
3) Act as the bridge between business, product, and technology, ensuring needs are understood, prioritized, and transformed into viable solutions.
4) Coordinate dependencies and priorities with other teams, resolving conflicts and ensuring efficient use of time and resources.
5) Actively participate in functional and technical definition of integrations, using testing and monitoring tools to validate flows.
6) Supervise product execution and delivery, ensuring quality, tracking, and alignment with planning.
7) Lead and mentor the development team, both senior and junior, facilitating decision-making, removing blockers, and promoting best practices.
8) Foster a culture of continuous improvement and accountability, delivering robust, maintainable solutions aligned with organizational standards.

description: This role is linked to Demand & Prices Services and B2B Products & Pricing within the Demand & Prices Iberia area. As Tech Lead, I led the development of technical solutions for product creation and pricing in the B2B segment.
Main responsibilities:
1) Technical and strategic leadership: Define and manage architecture and development of pricing tools, ensuring alignment with business objectives and best practices.
2) Management of tools and processes: Oversee corporate tools, liaise with Digital Solutions Iberia (DSI), and drive process automation and optimization.
3) Team coordination: Lead a DevTeam of 5-10 people in planning, resource allocation, project tracking, and budget management.
4) Process analysis and optimization: Identify improvements in demand and pricing management, applying best-practice architectures.
5) Participation in strategic projects: Represent Demand & Prices in cross-functional projects, ensuring integration of new solutions with existing systems and facilitating digital transformation.
